channel.title: Pueblo County|Colorado|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Pueblo County|Colorado|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-50 East at Bus. US-50 West
item.description: US-50 East at Bus. US-50 West to Avondale. This is the eastern end of the Pueblo business loop. Continue east on US-50 for La Junta.

item.title: US-50 East/CO-96 East Approaching US-50/CO-96 Split
item.description: US-50 East/CO-96 East approaching US-50/CO-96 split. Use left lane for CO-96 East to Eads.

item.title: US-50 East/CO-96 East Approaching US-50/CO-96 Split
item.description: US-50 East/CO-96 East approaching US-50/CO-96 split. Use left lane for CO-96 East to Ordway.

item.title: US-50 East - Pueblo Chemical Depot
item.description: US-50 East approaching Pueblo Chemical Depot/PuebloPlex interchange.

item.title: US-50 East at CO-231 South
item.description: US-50 East at CO-231 South/36th Lane.

item.title: US-50 East - Pueblo Memorial Airport
item.description: US-50 East at Pueblo Memorial Airport interchange.

item.title: US-50 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-50 east. Distance to La Junta, and Lamar.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching CO-47/CO-96
item.description: US-50 East approaching CO-47/CO-96 West/4th St./Cesar Chavez Blvd. CO-96 joins US-50 eastbound to Avondale.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 100A
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 100A - US-50 East/La Junta. US-50 joins I-25 northbound through Pueblo.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 99B
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 99B - 13th St./Santa Fe Ave.

item.title: CO-96 East (4th St.) at Santa Fe Ave.
item.description: CO-96 East (4th St.) at Santa Fe Ave. in Pueblo. Turn right for I-25 southbound; continue east on 4th St. for I-25 north.

item.title: CO-96 East at CO-45
item.description: CO-96 East at CO-45 (South Pueblo Blvd.)

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 71
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 71 - Graneros Road.

item.title: End CO-165 in Colorado City
item.description: End CO-165 east at I-25 in Colorado City. This is also the end of the Frontier Pathways Scenic Byway.

item.title: End CO-165 East at I-25
item.description: End CO-165 East at I-25. Use I-25 south for Walsenburg; I-25 north for Pueblo.

item.title: CO-165 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CO-165 west. Distance to Rye and San Isabel.

item.title: I-25 Offramp at CO-165
item.description: I-25 south offramp (Exit 74) at CO-165. Turn right for CO-165.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 74
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 74 - CO-165/Colorado City/Rye.

item.title: I-25 South Approaching Exit 74
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 74 - CO-165/Colorado City/Rye. CO-165 is part of the Frontier Pathways Scenic Byway.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 77
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 77 - Abbey Road/Hatchet Ranch Road.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 83
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 83 (No Name).

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 87
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 87 - Verde Road.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 88
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 88 - Burnt Mill Road.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 91
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 91 - Stem Beach.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 95
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 95 - CO-45 North/Pueblo Blvd. CO-45 is the western beltway around Pueblo.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 95
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 95 - Illinois Ave.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 96
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 96 - Minnequa Ave./Indiana Ave.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 97A
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 97A - Central Ave.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 97B
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 97B - Abriendo Ave.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 98B and 98A
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 98B - 1st St. Approaching Exit 98A - Business US-50/La Junta. Use 1st St. to access the Frontier Pathways Scenic Byway.

item.title: I-25 South - Exits 99A and 98B
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 99A - To CO-96/6th St. Approaching Exit 98B - 1st St.

item.title: I-25 South - Exits 99A and 99B
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 99B - 13th St./Santa Fe Ave. Approaching Exit 99A - To CO-96/6th St.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 99B
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 99B - 13th St./Santa Fe Ave.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 100A
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 100A - US-50 East/La Junta. US-50 leaves I-25 southbound here.

item.title: I-25 South - Exits 100B and 100A
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 100B - 29th St. Approaching Exit 100A - US-50 East/La Junta.

item.title: US-50 East at I-25 South
item.description: US-50 east at I-25 South onramp in Pueblo.

item.title: US-50 East at I-25 South
item.description: US-50 east at I-25 south to Walsenburg.

item.title: US-50 East at I-25/CO-47
item.description: US-50 east at I-25/CO-47. US-50 east continues south briefly on I-25 through Pueblo. An alternate route for US-50 east is to continue straight on CO-47, with loops around to connect with US-50 east.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching I-25
item.description: US-50 east at Elizabeth St. approaching I-25/CO-47 junction in Pueblo. Use I-25 south for Walsenburg.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching I-25 and CO-47
item.description: US-50 East Approaching I-25 and CO-47 in Pueblo. US-50 joins I-25 south briefly through Pueblo.

item.title: US-50 East - Pueblo City Limits
item.description: Pueblo City Limits on US-50 east. Elevation 4,695 feet. Pueblo is the 9th biggest city in Colorado according to the 2012 US Census estimate.

item.title: US-50 East at CO-45
item.description: US-50 east at CO-45 South/Pueblo Blvd. Pueblo Blvd. is the beltway around the west side of Pueblo.

item.title: US-50 East - Pueblo West Next 3 Exits
item.description: US-50 East - Pueblo West Next 3 Exits.
